API¶

mosviz.loaders Package¶

Data loaders for MOSViz

Functions¶

acs_cutout_image_reader(file_name) Data loader for the ACS cut-outs for the DEIMOS spectra.
deimos_spectrum1D_reader(file_name) Data loader for Keck/DEIMOS 1D spectra.
deimos_spectrum2D_reader(file_name) Data loader for Keck/DEIMOS 2D spectra.
pre_nircam_image_reader(file_name) Data loader for simulated NIRCam image.
pre_nirspec_level2_reader(file_name) THIS IS A TEST!
pre_nirspec_spectrum1d_reader(file_name) Data loader for MOSViz 1D spectrum.
pre_nirspec_spectrum2d_reader(file_name) Data loader for simulated NIRSpec 2D spectrum.
